TopicTitle: eve landing: a series of bad mistakes ending in a good landing

Articles.Content:
i ending  putting the probe core to control the lander in the worng direction;  same with the decouper for the heatshield; and to make it wrost the things i add a docking port on top the inflatable thinking in that way i make it a more estable when i attached to  the rocket

the good part: the docking port brun on the re-entry so it was possible to deploy the heat shield

the probe core in bad direction dont give me any problem

 

it was a nice landing
